author: grapebaba
content: Is Ephemeral Header the next highest priority spec that needs to be implemented?

author: kolbyml
content: what are you comparing it to?

author: kolbyml
content: Getting the History Network 100% is currently the highest priority. So supporting genesis -> HEAD. HEAD would be Ephemeral Headers so yes

author: kolbyml
content:
<@&1331662799000043681>  <@&1331663350937157813> <@&1331663543870685234> <@&1331663186088431788> 

The update to the Ephemeral Header's spec will likely be done and merged by Wednesday or Thursday. I believe <@510413979080720385> is out of concerns? and should be approving it soon.

If other teams want to üëç the PR, or raise final concerns consider this a heads up. If there are any concerns brought up we will go from there and work to resolve them. But assuming no further concerns are brought up I would be looking to merge the PR on Wednesday or Thursday so maybe like 30-40 hours? As I don't think there is anything else blocking the PR, or nothing has been brought up except fairly minor things at this stage.

Here is the PR <https://github.com/ethereum/portal-network-specs/pull/387>
